Emails.resetPasswordMain: We received a request to reset your password. If you made this request, use the code below to reset your password. If not, do not share this code with anyone and simply ignore this email.
Emails.migrateEmailMain: We received a request to change your email. If you made this request, use the code below to change your email. If not, do not share this code with anyone and simply ignore this email.
Emails.terminateAccountMain: We received a request to permanently delete your account. Please be aware that this action is irreversible, and all your data will be permanently lost. If you made this request, use the code below to proceed. If not, do not share this code with anyone and simply ignore this email.
Emails.twoFactorAuthMain: We detected a new login attempt to your account. If this was you use the code below to continue. If not, do not share this code with anyone and simply ignore this email.

TerminateAccountPage.title: Terminate you account
TerminateAccountPage.description: Please read the following before deleting you account!
TerminateAccountPage.legal:
By requesting the termination of my account, I acknowledge and consent to the permanent deletion of my account and all personal data associated with it in accordance with applicable European Union data protection laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). I understand that this action is irreversible, and I will lose access to all services, content, and information linked to my account, including but not limited to saved preferences, purchase history, messages, and uploaded files.

I am aware that certain data may be retained if required by law or for legitimate business purposes, such as compliance with tax or accounting obligations, resolution of disputes, or enforcement of contractual terms. Any retained data will be securely stored and processed only for the purposes permitted under applicable law.

By proceeding with the account termination, I confirm that I am exercising my right to erasure and have understood the consequences of this action. I also acknowledge that the deletion process may take a limited amount of time to complete, and once finalized, recovery of deleted data will not be possible. 

I understand that I may contact the Data Protection Officer (DPO) or the designated data privacy contact provided by the service for any questions or clarifications regarding my data, my rights under GDPR, or the account deletion process.
TerminateAccountPage.terms: I agree to the terms stated above

AccountPage.title: Account
AccountPage.description: Manage your info and edit your preferences to make {brand} work better for you.
AccountPage.avatarChangeDescription: Change your avatar by uploading or dropping a file
AccountPage.personalizationDescription: Manage the personal information and security details of your {brand} account.
AccountPage.customizationDescription: Choose your color, theme and language preferences for your {brand} account.
AccountPage.privacyDescription: Select privacy options for your {brand} account
AccountPage.twoFactorAuthDescription: By enabling Two-factor Authentication (2FA) your account can fall into the hands of malicious users who gained access to the login details of your account. It does that by sending an email that contains a One-Time Verification Code that can be used to access your account. Without the code attackers or malicious users will be unable to login to your account.
AccountPage.migrateEmailDescription: If you believe that you email address has been hacked or you just feel like it's time for a new one you may migrate your email address to a new one. During this transfer all your data will remain intact and you old email will be available for signup. However there will be a {cooldown} days cooldown before you can change your email again.
AccountPage.resetPasswordDescription: If you have forgotten your password or believe it may have been compromised, you can reset it to secure your account. A password reset link will be sent to your registered email address, allowing you to create a new, secure password. Once reset, your previous password will no longer work, preventing unauthorized access.
AccountPage.logoutDescription: Logging out will end your current session on this device. This is useful if you're using a shared or public computer or simply want to ensure your account remains secure. You can log back in at any time using your email and password.
AccountPage.terminateAccountDescription: Terminating your account is a permanent action that deletes all your data and revokes access to all associated services. This process cannot be undone. If you are sure you no longer want to use this account, you may proceed. Please note that you may be required to verify your identity before termination is completed.
